Первый раз пишу обзор на игру, ибо нет сил терпеть этого ****. Эта игра где люди, почему то, заходят и выходят из комнаты или же заходят и афкашат, незнаю тролили это, или просто бараны которых впустили в интернет. Что касается самой игры то это невообразимо весело, если у убийцы заоблачный пинг он может тебя бить за 3, а то и 4 метра, или же сокомандники которые почему то афкашет уже в игре, или же просто ходят и ждут пока не останутся одни. Нахрена портить хорошую игру? Несчитая читерского убийцы с инвизом основная проблема состоит в команде баранов. Для игры с друзьям игра подходит хорошо, но вот в ранг лучше не соваться, надеюсь что ливерам из комнату, в будущем, будут давать штраф или, что то типо того.

Это новый жанр! Великолепно, очень хорошо проработано окружение, база проста и незамысловата. Желаю дальнейшего развития игре.

I know I don't have many hours now, but I played this game enough in the beta to give a potential buyer a good idea of what your getting yourself into. I supose it should also be noted that no I was not given any free beta keys for this game so what you read is my unfiltered opinion. 

The Good
-While not completly originally the the 4v1 gameplay in this game is USUALLY satisfying if your the killer or a survivor.

-The game looks pretty good. Although the levels are randomly generated. The assets used for each map stay the same.

-The sounds are good and the heartbeat noise that alerts you when the killer is near adds alot of tension.

-There isn't much of a hud or screen clutter to remind you it's just a game, and what is there is useful.

The Bad
-The bad stuff about the game out weighs the things it does well for me at least.

-The game currently will not allow you to join a lobby with your friends. Leaving you with 2 options either make your own lobby and invite 4 of your friends (assuming you have 4 friends that also own this game.) or play pub matches.

-Also because people can't join their friends it creates another issue. Which is people will spam joining and leaving lobbies to try and get into the same one as the person they want to play with. Which makes the wait time for a game to start that much longer.

-If you want to be the killer you have to make your own lobby. Which means you could end up waiting a long time (some times 30mins) just to get a game started. Then after the game is finished you have to start all over because the game doesn't keep the lobby together.

-Even after beta release the game can still be clunky with frame rate drops and genral proformance issues.

-The progression system just seems like an after thought added in so they can try and give you something to keep you playing.

-No way to chat with other players in game. So if you get stuck with people who suck and or don't know what they are doing your almost sure to lose. I should note that if you are the last one alive they allow you to use a trap door that is randomly hidden somewhere in the level to escape which helps keep things more balanced.

-This last one only applies if you were thinking about getting the deluxe edition of the game. The extra stuff that was promised on the games release being the soundtrack and art book have yet to be received. Which I honestly only bought the deluxe edition for the 3 beta keys that it came with which I did receive and they worked fine. So I wouldn't recommend buying the deluxe edition.

Final Words
At this point in time I would say wait to buy the game. With the summer sale right around the corner you might be able to get it really cheap, and at least that way if this game doesn't get it's $hit together and ends up dying you won't have wasted so much money. If you don't like potentially buying a dead game then just avoid this one.

很好的遊戲但是幀數非常的低，我的顯卡是GTX960M 處理器是I7 4710 平常玩的大型遊戲還能有60幀，在這個遊戲里只有20-27幀，按照網上教程修改垂直同步后的幀數也勉強只能達到25-31幀，遇到屠殺者的時候幀數還會劇降。
另外這個遊戲沒有辦法組隊打野局，想要和好友玩的只能用自定義模式。

Ich kann dieses Spiel nur weiterempfehlen. Am Anfang war ich auch skeptisch und habe mir auch bei dem Preis nicht viel erhofft. Jedoch muss ich sagen ich wurde nicht enttäuscht. Anfangs habe ich mir auch Gedanken über das Balancing gemacht. Jedoch habe ich festgestellt, dass man es als Killer auch nicht immer leicht hat. Vorallem, wenn man gegen spieler spielt, die wissen was sie tun. Allerdings braucht man auch als Killer eine gewisse Strategie. Das beste Beispiel ist Trapper, seine Fallen lassen sich auch strategisch richtig gut einsetzen. Auch wenn man keine Freunde hat, die dieses Spiel spielen macht es auch alleine einen heiden Spaß. Ich kann es voll und ganz weiterempfehlen.

The game has come a long way from being completely unbalanced into a decent and enjoyable experience. Sure, the game still has flaws, no doubt. Both on killer and survivor side. One thing people tend to forget though is how far the game has come from infinite looping, permanently destroyed hooks, its ranked system and many broken perks to what it is today.

I'm glad the devs stuck with it and made something out of this game. I can definitely recommend it.

It's not about scores or rank,it's about what kind of person u choose to be. Brave or weak,pround or guilty.

这游戏有很多有优缺点，但我欣赏其中一点 ：你能选择表达不同的人性。
我玩人的时间比较多，说说我的感受：很多高等级的人感觉陷进了“分数”这个泥潭 ，拔网线或者冷漠得见死不救，所做的每一步都是为了得分，得分，得分，被游戏机制牵着走，而忽略了这个游戏所能带给我们的享受。

这是，我被挂树上看到3个20级萌新不顾一切跑来救我时感到的，这是，我试着去冒着掉级危险去救人，那种热血澎湃的环境中感到的。

全力冲级的人们，你们得到了许多，但也失去了许多 ：）

作为人类来说，每个人都有逃出生机的可能，没有谁应该被哪来当做挡箭牌，4个人如果能够相互信任，团结协作，那就能像技能说的那样“no one left behind"。当然，这不是说说就能做到 ：），要别人相信你，前提是你相信别人。当你能够有勇气，义无反顾地相信别人时（比如说有勇气接受掉段的结果时 ：），你会发现这个游戏反馈给你的感动，你会发现你重新认识了这个游戏。

其实，分数什么都不是，你一直20级也一样能玩的很开心，否则，就算你1级也一样玩的提心吊胆，苦闷异常。

最后，给人类新手一些建议。
1、不要紧张
2、对地图不熟的话开局首先找到队友，尽量跟着他
3、尽量不要一人在空旷的地方修发动机
4、遭遇屠夫：放木板后别急着走，站在木板前看清屠夫走哪里，反向跑和迂回绕是你逃生的好办法
5、救人：自杀的救不了，地下室的救不了，屠夫不动的救不了。屠夫砍人和老屠夫放夹子是救人的好时机，但前提是你要足够近。另外，屠夫背人时一般情况下近距离尾随他危险不大，因为人会挣扎，屠夫急着找钩子，很少观察周围

Dead By Daylight is a really cool concept of a game and is done very well. The people who are saying we need VOIP are WRONG. That would ruin the unknowing of where the killer is and is way to OP for the survivors. Even if the VOIP was directional you could just tell the survivors your TS or Discord IP adress so you could talk anywhere on the map. What they could do is add some sort of Ping system where the characters just say a voice line, for example they could say "Heal Me" "Come Over Here" things like that. If they would add that, the killers could still here the characters say the voice lines (if they are close enough) and it would work very will :)

Dead by Daylight is pretty much a horror mod of Evolve, and a poorly executed one at that, here's why:

+ OP Survivors: Survivors have perks that directly neutralize killer perks. These can include: faster healing, silent movement, more difficult to track/detect and perks that allow you to detect killers regardless of distance, cloak (Wraith) or obstructions (trees/walls).

+ Environment favors survivors: While the levls are dynamic (randomly generated) they all feature several elements that grant survivors considerable advantage. Below are some examples:

   - Hipity Hop: Low walls and windows create what are known as "juke spots" locations where a survivor repeatedly hops out of/over one ledge and back through the other. Survivors are much faster than the killer and become uncatachable.This tactic serves as both a troll and buys time for the other survivors.

   - Now You See Me: The environment provides abundant concealment for survivors. All maps are shrouded in both a dark light and a miasma of fog. The map itself is populated with limitless tall grass and ruins allowing survivors to hide in plain sight.

+ Clunky Killer: In many horror films the monster is often an un-stoppable, supernatural, omnipotent killing machine who seems to know the survivor's every move. Dead by Daylight forsakes this in favor of a lumbering, clumsy, oblivious bafoon. Examples include:

   - No crosshairs or aiming/range indicator. All killers in Dead by Daylight only have access to two (2) modes of attack. A slow, inacurate melee and a unique secondary power/gadget. However you don't have any way of telling the range of your attack before you encounter an enemy player and are forced to guess if you're close enough, with each missed swing costing you valuable seconds which is more time than even an unexperienced player needs to escape.

   - Slow: Survivors in DbD are insanely agile. Able to run for extended periods and vault objects in less than 3 seconds (yes I timed it) all without getting tired or suffering negative effects from prologed or repeated use. Killers, on the other hand barely manage a brisk walk, have no sprint capability and take in excess of 5 seconds to clear the same obstacles. Add to this that if a killer manages to hit a survivor they recieve an instant speed and manuverability buff that incurs no penalty upon expiration. Survivors freed from hooks also inherit this buff which guarantees escape and leaves the killer with nothing.

   - Ghosts in the Fog: If a survivor is found and chased by a killer they leave orange "hashes" on the environment intended to indicate general direction of travel. Survivors have been known to use this vague means of tracking to thier advantage. Instead if fleeing in a a straight line they will often run around objects swamping the area in marks making tracking impossible. These hashes also vanish after a set time leaving no room to get turned around which is exactly what this tactic does.

+ An Easy Escape: The killer's objective is simple; kill all four enemy players. The survivors have it even easier; activate any five of eight generators scattered about the map. This is made easier by the fact that all eight generators are feaseable, meaning that none are duds or traps. Also, any progress made by a survivor on a gen is kept even if they leave before finishing.

+ Short End: Killer perks are often a random miss-mash of benifits. Most do very little or nothing to help you track survivors or find them in the first place. Also consider that each time you complete you "blood web" (skill tree) a new, random one is generated and it will, more often than not, contain useless items that don't make you any more effective. Survivors blood webs however, give them early access to detection and evasion perks as well as items such as the flashlight and medkit.

+ No Fear: With all the above advantages playing as a killer rarely feels rewarding. The idea is for the victims to be frightened of the killer not laugh all the way to the bank match after match with thousands of points at a time.

Dead by Daylight - это когда в команде 4 человека, но каждый сам за себя
Dead by Daylight - это когда ты помогаешь союзнику выбраться из капкана, а в итоге маньяк ловит тебя и вешает на крюк вместо него
Dead by Daylight - это когда ты умираешь на крюке, а союзники в это время ремонтируют генераторы
Dead by Daylight - это когда ты ремонтируешь последний генератор, а союзник, убегающий от маньяка, приводит его прямо к тебе, и маньяк бежит уже не за ним, а за тобой
Dead by Daylight - это когда твое сердцебиение повышается одновременно с сердцебиением персонажа
Dead by Daylight - это когда ты с оружием идешь убивать хейтеров (которых у тебя нет на YouTube, но ты прекрасно воображаешь их в лице игроков)
Dead by Daylight - это когда от маньяка можно убежать делая безумные петли по дороге
Dead by Daylight - это когда бегущий прямо - рак, нуб, новичок
Dead by Daylight - это когда маньяку необходим двойник, которого нет, ибо ворот для успешного побега двое
Dead by Daylight - это когда ты следишь, чтобы жертву не сняли с крюка, а люди этим временем чинят все генераторы и бегут к воротам
Dead by Daylight - это когда ты отошел от крюка с жертвой на 10 метров, а ей в это время помогли сбежать
Dead by Daylight - это когда ты играешь в прятки по-взрослому
Dead by Daylight - это когда поиграть с друзьями можно только в приватном лобби
Dead by Daylight - это когда тебе наконец-то пригодились школьные знания английского языка
Dead by Daylight - это когда Dead by Daylight выходит раньше, чем "Friday the 13th: The Game"
Dead by Daylight - это когда фанаты Outlast испытывают оргазм
Dead by Daylight - это когда нет надоевшего всем раннего доступа
Dead by Daylight - это когда ты покупаешь готовый продукт, полностью оправдывающий свою цену

This game is unplayable without a party system to reach online games with your friends and randoms. When you don't have enogh friends to play private, then there's truly no fun way of playing with your friends. Trying to be lucky and joinning their lobby is impossible as well. I'll change my review once they add this in an update. (Now fixed)

The idea of the game is great and the early hours of playing it are fun. However as the game goes on the flaws become obvious to all.

1. Balance: After the victims reach lvl 15 they start getting extra perk slots. While the Killers also get the same extra slots it does not work out as well. A team with everyone have 2-3 perks will not even be bothered by the killer unless the players are drunk... I mean currently vomiting on the toliet drunk. I have played both sides in this scenario and it is just horribly balanced and honestly not fun.

1. The Community: It is utter garbage. People will do anything to protect their rank. From refusing to play with anyone who is not as high ranked as them to disconnecting (pulling the plug or shutting off wireless) from the game when the Killer actually gets ahold of them. Time and time again as you are about to sacrifice someone who has a high rank poof they are gone. They keep everything since the game considers it äccidental. Worst part the killer ends up losing points and rank because they finished the game.

Also this game was made to be played with random groups. People are not meant to be able to communicate while the match is ruinning. The Devs made an unranked mode for friends to play. However half the posts you will see on the forums are people who cry about this. Unfortunaley the Devs are bowing to pressure and the game is going to become even more unbalanced.

There is potential but the Devs need to make some hard decisions. A lot of these problems popped up in the beta but nothing was done. I would reccommend that you wait till the price is $9.99 Maybe by then the devs will have fixed these issues.

The premise of this game has the potential to be something awesome. The problem is as usual, the players, and hacking. 

The problem with the players is that like any other video game, they have figured a way to game the system so it ruins the fun of the game. The biggest thing about the premise is that you are supposed to get away, but too many people have figured how to obstacle hop. The will just sit there and wait for you to come for them and hop through a window. You go all the way around, they jump back through. The do it with the crates as well until you breal them. It's so incredibly lame as a killer it makes you want to just quit playing because while one person is obstacle hoping the other players are all targeting generators. Which brings us to problem number two int he premise is that the game is only one mode and it's got boring FAST. Players are supposed to turn on generators to open the escape and get out. That's it. Nothing more. It's really awful in that department because the game never changes for the Killer. You try to catch people, and for the most part you can get a few kills, but anyone who has played more than 10 minutes obstacle hops you to bordome.

The hacking is not TOO bad, but a lot of people are using some sort of speed cheat and ability to see you and other players. It ruins the game too.

I was really hoping for a survival mode to which there is like a huanted house or something to which the survivors tried to live as long as possible. The generator defense game just ruins the game for me.  

I bought the deluxe on sale, and $30 later I am highly dissatisfied with the game. The content that is supposed to be with the deluxe edition isn't even there. This game is practically in early access and it's listed as a full game. Shameless devcelopers.

 It pains me to not reccomend the game because it feels like it's soon to become a DLC wh0re . It's inevitable for that too happen. But more content better come fast or this game will dry up faster than the sahara after a rain storm.

Your ultimate weapons are a flashlight and a toolbox, highly impractical and completely exhaustable.

The only time I won this game was when I hid like a little bitch when my teammates were being brutally slaughtered.|

17年8月更新：人类游戏体验极差，开发组长期削弱人类，加强屠夫，甚至推出了远程屠夫，新人慎入，开始绝对秒躺

一个非常有趣的恐怖生存兼追杀游戏，也算是市面上第一个比较成功4v1恐怖类的游戏（黑色星期五比该作更早开发，但发售更迟），游戏发售至今开发商一直在积极更新新内容以及开展各种游戏活动，玩家数量也常期稳定在1万以上，顶峰2万。

由于游戏采用P2P连线模式，所以服务器会自动将你与当前地区的玩家匹配，因此在绝大部分时间下是不会卡的，因此，不需要VPN！不需要VPN！不需要VPN！

画面方面由于算是独立游戏，并不出色，但本作并不是靠画面来获得玩家欢心的，靠的是有趣的玩法以及略微带有竞技要素的风格。目前为止，游戏一共有9个幸存者，7个杀手，大量的地图。每个角色都有自己独特的技能，当你的角色到达30级后，你将可以获得该角色的传承技能，然后你可以在其它角色的技能树里面获得已经传承的技能。因此，技能搭配也是本作的一大乐趣之一。地图也有多种风格，每个地点都有不同的风格，玩家可以利用各种地形来让每一局游戏都变得不可预测。

同时不管是杀手还是生还者，都有大量附加品，道具，以及祭品可供获得和使用，为游戏带来了更多的变数，不过需要注意的是，所有道具都是一次性使用，如果你在游戏中死亡或者用完，你将会永远失去该物品，唯一的办法是不要把道具消耗完，并且活着带出来（杀手不可以）。

最后是时候说下缺点，本作最大的缺点就是bug多，虽然制作组一直在修正bug，但是每次修正了以后又会有新的bug出现，有时候甚至会影响游戏进行，十分扫兴。不过，哪个游戏没有bug呢？而且并不是100%触发的，所以，忍忍就好，开发组态度十分好，他们甚至在中国建立了微信以及微博，不断听取玩家意见，有时候还会做一些符合中国特色的游戏活动或者道具，算是Steam上面难得对国人态度十分友好的开发商。

还有一个不足就是本作dlc大部分需要收费，但是玩家不购买dlc也不会影响游戏，虽然不能使用dlc的角色，但还是可以跟买了dlc的玩家一起玩，新地图也是面对所有玩家免费开放的，所以不会区别对待。选择性入手即可（著名电影系列《月光光心慌慌》在本作里面有专属dlc，包含电影里的杀手以及核心女主，非常推荐粉丝入手）

游戏目前周年特卖中，豪华版仅售44元，普通版原价82，打折48，对于这么良心的游戏，大家有什么理由拒绝呢，总之我是非常推荐这款有趣的联网游戏给大家的，不管你是单枪匹马还是跟好友同乐，你都会获得大量的乐趣

希望日后能有更多著名杀手登场
